EmailTemplate.name: CH Director Decline
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
{!Transaction__c.PresenterName__c},
A director has declined to sign the application to close:
Company name: {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c} Company Number:{!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}
The application has been cancelled as a result.
If you still wish to close the company, you'll need to begin the process again using the following link:{!Transaction__c.TransactionPath__c}.
This is an automated email, please do not reply. Forward any enquiries to the following: Email: enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk Service Desk: +44 (0)303 1234 500
